title: Pets Named After League!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/byKtDO6.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/8WoIEMR.jpg

Meet Nidalee!

When it came time to choose a name for my kitteh, I couldn’t resist borrowing from the sassiest cat-lady in League.

Any other pets out there with League-related names? Sound off in the comments below, and don’t skimp on the adorable pics!

replies.body: Getting a cat and naming it Meowkai is on my to-do list in life.

Step one: Get a pet bird
Step two: Name it Azir
Step three: Teach it how to dance
Step four: Shurima shuffle.

> Step one: Get a pet bird
> Step two: Name it Anivia
> Step three: Teach it chicken dance
> Step four: Dance Dance Freezolution

Fixed

Cockatiels>Cats 
https://youtu.be/U0Iqx1WIjz8
Pls get a refund for your cat.
D: I am an equal opportunity animal lover!
https://36.media.tumblr.com/6fa2987a19d082897717e71253c21c71/tumblr_mxdyvh35o71rfqtero1_500.jpg

that's right, now say hello to missile cat

Evasive maneuvers!

don't even think about trying to flee into the ocean.  we got that covered too

http://littlefun.org/uploads/522d2cc0e691b21dcd7d6bad_736.jpg
This thread gives me life.

it also takes it away

http://i.giftrunk.com/766q7p.gif
I feel like this should be where someone points out that Mhija's pet would eat your pet.

I once thought Cockatiels were awesome.
Then I heard one.
. . . Through a phone and up a flight of stairs.
I don't *want* to know how loud that thing was in person.
I have a Hedgehog named Rumble. It really really fits him.
Rammus is a armourdillo. Get over it.
clearly never played a sonic game in his life..
ok :(

I have two cats named after League champions! :D 

I also have a Nidalee (calico) and the other guy is Rengar! (Sorry for the bad photo, it's hard to get both of them together. >_>

EDIT: GG posted on my EUW account, haha.
but it's got you in it, cant be a bad photo <3
smooth
http://i.imgur.com/RjhgRow.gif

They're kind of adorable - if gravity-defying. I love calicos, but all the ones I've known have been jerks. It's... sad, really. 

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

http://i.imgur.com/tWdPkz2.jpg

This is baby nidalee. 

That was a few months ago. She is now fed (Read: Fat) and is a pain in the ass. Every night I'll hear from someone in the living room:

NIDA.
STOP SCRATCHING!
OW! STOP IT!
Fed Nidalee does damage

This is Riven!

She has a broken tail, and jumps a lot.  Seemed fitting.

Dont know, that cat should be called taric CAUSE SHES OUTRAGEOUS 

My black husky (dont know why hes completely black) is called Nocturne
Meet Nocturne,  he is a sneaky little troublemaker, his sneezing is hilarious
I have a pet rat named twitch
Rammus the turtle... and yes, I am aware of the armadillo predicament. But it was cute.
u ate ur dead friend w0t

[PREPARE YOURSELVES](https://www.facebook.com/AhriAndTeemo?fref=ts).

(They're not mine but I have babysat them before, so can confirm they're even cuter in person)
I have 2 kittens. The first is an all black male named Rengar, and the 2nd is a gray female named Tibbers!
to bad that wasn't a boy cat you could have named him {{champion:91}}

Lulu just chillin, she thinks she's human sometimes. she's a german shepherd, will be 2 years old this november! called her Lulu because she was cute but deadly at the same time haha.

http://puu.sh/jI16H/2aef3349b9.jpg
My girlfriend has 2 bunnies named Riven and Zhonya.
Bunnies > everything

Pft
I own bunnies and those guys are jerks
Scratch the living fuck out of you if you pick them up
Not if you get non-jerk bunnies. My bunny only scratches me if I stop rubbing his lil head :)

I have 10 bunnies and they all act like that.
No such thing as a non-jerk bunny. lol
Or, not one that I've ever seen... must be a rare species.

I have a Flemish Giant and he is the best thing ever! It seems that bigger breads tend to be less jerky lol.

Here is a Flemish (not mine) being totally not a jerk.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFxVYHUY4q4

Damn that rabbit is big.
Makes sense though, my friend used to have a rabbit that wasn't jerky. Just let you pet him and never really gave a crap, just kept eating or drinking or pooping or whatever he was doing at the time.
I don't have any pets, but it would be cool to have a koi fish named Nami.
Lucian:
That pose XD

No League names yet, but I named my dog Ronon after the Stargate: Atlantis character.
